name: Havana afraid fruit APA 2/6
description: Havana afraid fruit APA. Our treasure of post-soviet collection. The profile of the beer is a bright, juicy taste with notes of grapefruit and orange of a unique variety called «Rocket to Russian» Great choice for hot summers and Cold War for “tovarish”! Ingredients – water, malt, American hops with citrus character, yeast ABV: 5,1 % Energy 173kJ Per 100ml Carbohydrates 14.3 g Per 100ml IBU 38 Only 6 bottle in stock!
